label: Front-End
title: Front-End Development
description: With a strong foundation in core web technologies, I build modern, accessible, and high-performance user interfaces.
points: Building interactive UIs with modern, functional React.
Utilising JavaScript component libraries to ensure design consistency and speed up development.
Crafting responsive and accessible layouts using core HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Implementing on-page SEO best practices to improve search visibility.

label: Back-End
title: Back-End Development
description: I develop robust server-side logic and APIs to power web applications, using a range of languages and frameworks.
points: Building robust web applications and APIs.
Developing server-side logic and services using both NodeJS and Python.
Designing and implementing RESTful APIs to handle client-server communication.
Working with both SQL and NoSQL databases to manage application data.

label: DevOps & Cloud
title: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure
description: I have practical experience in deploying and managing applications using modern DevOps practices and cloud services.
points: Developing and deploying full-stack applications on cloud platforms, with strong experience in AWS.
Using Docker to create consistent, portable environments for development and deployment.
Utilising CI/CD tools like Github Actions to automate the deployment of containerised applications.
Proficient in administering Linux servers via SSH, including server setup, configuration, and writing Bash scripts for automation.

label: AI & Automation
title: AI & Automation
description: I have a keen interest and growing experience in leveraging emerging AI tools to build smarter applications and workflows.
points: Integrating generative AI platforms like OpenAI/GPT and Gemini to enhance application capabilities.
Developing custom tools to automate workflows and streamline repetitive tasks.
Using Python as a primary language for AI scripting and API integration.
Actively exploring and experimenting with new AI models and their practical applications.
